title: Apply Charity Pledge to Account
description: A local charity has pledged to pay $200 towards a low-income customer's past-due utility bill.

tasks.description: Receive the payment pledge from the charity agency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the pledge details, including customer name, account number, and amount.

tasks.description: Verify the customer account and the past-due balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account details are correct.

tasks.description: Apply the pledged amount as a credit to the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully posts the credit, reducing the customer's balance due.
